channel.title: I Need Help Adding Dragon Dagger Special attack :|
channel.description:
i have the source called devolution v7.0 i deleted all npcs and such
im making my own shops training places and custom items
but i dont know how to add a special attack i tried to add dragon claw special attack but now i dont even have dds spec o.O
can someone give a tutorial or a link :confused: .
